title: Why I am an HIV/AIDS activist
description: For the last eight years, pop singer Annie Lennox has devoted the majority of her time to her SING campaign, raising awareness and money to combat HIV/AIDS. She shares the experiences that have inspired her, from working with Nelson Mandela to meeting a little African girl in a desperate situation.
author: Annie Lennox
keywords: TED, talks, AIDS, Africa, activism, health, personal growth, HIV
